name: Marthoni A/S
tag_list: fashion, clothes, women, lady, girl, accessories, shop, webshop, shopping, womens-wear, style, look, trend, brand
overview:
Marthoni is an online fashion retailer, specializing in women’s clothes and accessories. The online shop is representing more than 100 independent fashion retailers, and offers more than 265 brands.

The concept is based on offering local retail shops a solution for online retailing. Marthoni provides the local retailers a web shop that they can use to sell their products online. Through the web shop, retailers offers a wide range of branded clothes and accessories, such as pants, jeans, jackets, tops, dresses and shoes, from some of the largest international brands and Danish fashion designers. Shopping on the site is easy and safe for the costumer, and all necessary trading conditions, such as delivery information and payment terms, are listed on the website.
